title: Integer to Roman Numeral | Challenge
description: Roman numerals are a numeral system that originated in ancient Rome. They are still used today in various contexts, such as in the numbering of book chapters and movie sequels. In this challenge, you will be tasked with creating a function that converts an integer between 1 and 3999 (inclusive) to its Roman numeral representation.
